DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety MP-424 Peginterferon Alfa-2b Ribavirin ( RBV ) patient genotype 2 hepatitis C , relapse previous treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety MP-424 , Peginterferon Alfa-2b Ribavirin Relapser Genotype 2 Hepatitis C Infected Patients
DOC.criteria: Genotype 2 , chronic hepatitis C Relapsers ( patient relapse previous treatment ) Able willing follow contraception requirement Cirrhosis liver hepatic failure Hepatitis B surface antigenpositive HIV antibodiespositive History , concurrent hepatocellular carcinoma History , concurrent depression , schizophrenia , ; suicide attempt past Pregnant , lactating , suspect pregnant patient , male patient whose female partner pregnant
